text: Dalweynay dalwa calalsite rihme waay kay innah dalwa calalsitte dalweyná akkee kee Yallat agleyta hayta barra tekkeh akke waytek, kaadu dalweynáy dalwa calalsitte tet innah yan dalweyna akkee kee Yallat agleyta haa num yekkeh akke waytek tet rihmise waay, toh moominiinil carammowteh dalweynaa kee dalweynák toobat geytimmi iyyam fan dalwak
